ewani mal waththak sanwidhanaya kirima sandaha upades kihipayak: ekama kala parichchedaye pala samipawa situwanna epa - mema shaka abhyawakashaye wen kara thabanna ewita mal ekinekata samipa nowana athara mema kalaya thula awahira nowana shaka atha; mal waththa pawa anshawalata bedanna epa - mal waththa wadath swabhawika penumak laba dima sandaha sama anshayak sandahama wakra hadayan wali walin andinna; darshanaya sama paththakinma wiwruthawa thibe nam saha pitupasata godabasinne nam, darshanaya 1-2 pathiwalin wiwruthawa thibe nam usama pala situwanu labe; sapushpaka kalaya - eya digu ho warayakata dewarak siduwiya hakiya, obata eya bhawitha kirimata haki wiya yuthuya, nidasunak lesa, petuniya saha marijolds wasanthaye sita sarath samaya dakwa awahira wana athara, floks hata keti wiwekayak sahitha mal dekak atha; panduru - mal paththi sandaha da wishala ekathu kirimak wiya hakiya, eewa parimawa laba deyi; wiwidha balba saha gimhana pala situwimata his saila da ithiri kala yuthuya.

itha keti kalayak athulathadi merata gamath, nagarayath athara wenasa thuranwa yanu athi bawa aayojana prawardhana amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.gama sanwardhanaya nokara rata sanwardhanayak apeksha kala nohaki bawa hethema kiweya.hakmana mathiwarana kottashaye uurubokka nagara sanwardhana katayuthu pilibanda nirikshana charikawakata ekwemin amathiwaraya ese prakasha kaleya.uurubokka nagara sanwardhanayata adala idikirim katayuthu menma pawara gath idam wenuwen wandi gewim pramadawima pilibandawada thaman awadhanaya yomukara athi bawada ee mahatha pawasiya.danata kriyathmaka wana sanwardhana katayuthu walin pasu hakmana mathiwarana kottashaye mathara disthrikkaye suwishesha mathiwarana kottashayak bawata pathwana bawata kisida sakayak nathayida lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.ee sandaha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage purna sahayogaya menma awashya prathipadana labadimatath ethuma kriya kala bawa pawasana ee mahathaewan thathwayak yatathe hakmana sanwardhana katayuthu pramada wanne nathi bawa kiweya.thamange apekshawa ema wada katayuthu walin kotasak labana janawari masaye janatha ayithiyata pawarimayi yayida hethema prakasha kaleya.amathiwaraya meseda pawasiya.mita wasara kihipayakata pera pawathi uuru bokka nagarayath dan idiwena uurubokka nagarayath ahasata polawa wageyi.
